entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Excessive permissions on /tmp/VBCSCompiler #61900
  • [LSP] Enable Pull Diagnostics #61897
  • RegexGenerator fixer hijacks formatting #61893
  • Decide on rules for WithTrackingName #61888
  • File types should account for line directives #61887
    C# 11.0
  • Editorconfig UI should saveits UI properties #61885
  • Remove redundant parentheses isn't reported for single-parameterized lambda #61882
  • 'Fix paste inside string' happens in cases where it probably shouldn't. #61881
  • Lightbulbs to add usings blocked by similar namespaces #61880
  • VS doesn't support MSBuild <CopyLocalLockFileAssemblies> property #61878

Closed

  • csharpcodedefinitionwindow.codedefinitionwindowopensmetadataassource failing #60364
    17.3
  • Higher Level SyntaxProvider APIs for incremental generators #54725
    17.3
  • `required` usage in script compilations #61822
    C# 11.0
  • New rename dialog always renames file once checkbox is selected #60294
    17.3
  • [LSP] Workspace diagnostics can become stale and never update #60738
    17.3
  • False negative error CS9503 "Required member cannot be less visible than the containing type" for member in nested type #61528
    C# 11.0
  • False positive error CS9503 "Required member cannot be less visible than the containing type" for member in nested type #61527
    C# 11.0
  • Code cleanup supports third party analyzers #58089
    Backlog
  • Regex Generators fail to build with WPF #60257
  • Bad fix for param-nullchecking involving #if directive #59227
    17.3

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61903
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.3 #61902
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Editor config mapping #61899
    Area-IDE
  • Parse single identifier as expression in some cases #61896
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Skip assignment nullability warning in error case #61895
    Area-Compilers
  • Bind switch expression with checked-aware binder #61890
    Area-Compilers
  • Let VS fix Compilers.sln #61886
    Area-Compilers
  • Add FixAll in Solution support for Enable nullable refactoring #61879
    Area-Analyzers
  • Add FixAll support to ConvertIfToSwitch refactoring #61874
    Area-IDE
  • Global options tests #61872
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Add paranoia checks and more logging for a failure case #61898
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Re-enable Code Definition Window integration tests #60657
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Disallow required members in scripts and submissions #61889
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.2 #61901
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Remove unused function #61891
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Use inline rename session options for all checkboxes directly #61785
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix build CodeAction telemetry project #61894
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61892
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.2 #61866
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add helper for source generators to filter to nodes with attribute matching an attribute name #61293
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main #61883
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61884
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • 🚧 Support renaming symbols when the editor tries to fix a spell checking mistake. #61802
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Cleanups for our logging helpers #61669
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Calculate containing type effective accessibility for required member enforcement #61643
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main #61870
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Use auto-properties for PropertyOverrides #61107
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Polish async suggestions #61840
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61877
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fix Rune access issue on AspNetCoreVirtualChar #61875
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • allow third party codfixers to be run in code cleanup #59631
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61873
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Sort the generated CodeAction telemetry table. #61867
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Add Asp.net extensibility point for document highlighting. #61864
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61871
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • [LSP] Add support for reporting project level diagnostics in workspace pull #61819
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1822527 #61868
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #61865
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Add Document Outline Tool Window #61784
    Area-IDE
  • EnC: Allow adding/removing await expressions and yield statements in VB #61569
    Area-Compilers
  • File types emit #61646
    Area-Compilers
  • Ref fields escape analysis #61195
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Promote CompletionList.ItemsList to public API #61869
    Area-IDE
  • IOperation: expose information about the type parameter that is going to be used as the ".constrained" type for invoking abstract static methods #61811
    Concept-API, Area-Compilers, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • Remove invalid implicit downcast #19932
    Area-Compilers
  • [EnC] Allow deleting method #61806
    Area-Compilers
  • SerializableOptionSet and IOptionService cleanup #61839
    Area-IDE
